backend/main.mo: Motoko actor that generates tone-adjusted responses, maintains history, and exposes methods to ask the character, view history, and clear it.
feature_evidence.json: Structured feature report listing implemented features, related files, components, and test IDs for the project.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Text file providing brief descriptions of various frontend files for reference.
frontend/index.css: Global Tailwind-based style definitions configuring color tokens, themes, and base element styling.
frontend/index.html: Basic HTML shell that loads the React app via main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React component managing game state, transcript flow, user input handling, and settings modal.
frontend/src/components/CharacterPortrai: Displays the character's portrait image in a styled circular frame.
frontend/src/components/CharacterSetting: Modal dialog showing character and setting descriptions and allowing the user to rename the character.
frontend/src/components/GameHeader.tsx: Header component displaying background art, the character's name, and a settings button.
frontend/src/components/GameTranscript.t: Renders the scrolling transcript of player and character messages, auto-scrolling on updates.
frontend/src/components/PlayerInput.tsx: Text input box with send handling, Enter shortcuts, and disabled/processing states for game interaction.
frontend/src/game/characterCopy.ts: Provides character and setting descriptions plus a default character name string.
frontend/src/game/initialNarration.ts: Defines the opening narration for the date scene and the initial user prompt.
frontend/src/game/inputClassifier.ts: Classifies player input as positive, neutral, or negative based on keyword matching.
frontend/src/game/responseEngine.ts: Generates story responses, updates game state, and determines when the date ends.
frontend/src/game/storyBeats.ts: Contains story beat definitions with tone-based responses and affinity changes.
frontend/src/game/types.ts: Defines game-related types including tone categories, game state, and initial state.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to Internet Identity, refreshing queries when identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useGameSettings.ts: Manages persistent game settings such as the character name using local storage.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity context, login handling, and identity persistence.
frontend/src/index.css: Sets up Tailwind styles and custom CSS variables for theming and typography.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with QueryClient and InternetIdentityProvider.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with typography, container-query, and animation plugins, extending theme colors, fonts, radii, shadows, and accordion animations for a retro-styled UI.
project_state.json: Defines the project’s state, features, and image requirements for an interactive fiction date game with an original gumball-machine–headed character and deterministic offline response generation.
